entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
